channel.title: Project RL
channel.description:
First off, I'd like to point out why it's says "RL" instead of the actual name, well, that's because I don't want someone taking it before we get done with ours :P. Now, to get down to business.
[b]The History Behind It All:[/b] Project RL was born on April 14, 2008. I, myself, started this task and realized I needed another partner, I alone could not handle this major task I so hardenly set out to do. I asked my friend, Will, (who has been programming in Java for more than three years now) if he'd help me and he gladly accepted. Have you ever sat there on your computer, wanting, wishing, hoping someone would come along and make a great source? Well, your dreaming has finally payed off. I've played Runescape Private Servers long enough to know that most(not all!) are crap. Plagiarized or not coded very well, I got tired of actually find a "good" server and it only be up for two days and it somehow be off forever. I got sick of it so much, I decided to create my own server. With my bud Will.
[b][color=red]Currently Developing:[/b] 1.[b]Degrading Barrows[/b] 2.[b]Item Requirements On Skills[/b] 3.[b]Fixing the Pking Zone[/b] 4.[b]Custom Mini-Games(By Me.)[/b]
[b][color=green]Already Done:[/b] 1.[b]98% Mage(Working on Rune Requirements.)[/b] 2.[b]99% Range(Everything works for it.)[/b] 3.[b]100% 1v1 Pking.[/b] 4.[b]New Starting Place(Falador.)[/b] 5.[b]100% Specials(All the Dragon Weapons & Bows.)[/b] 6.[b]100% Custom Shops.[/b] 7.[b]Custom Training Spot(Mage By Me.)[/b] 8.[b]Originality[/b]
We are not accepting any applications for other people because we only can trust each other, apparently, some people can't take the fact that when they are mad, they release someone's hard work, so, with that said, NO! Applications are open :D. Sorry guys, just thought you all might wanna know how it's going. I will continue to Update this when we get something done.
Oh! If I forgot anything or need to add anything to make this better! Please! Tell me :D

item.title: Project RL
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

Well, thanks for telling me. I am looking to make this post better and I don’t want anyone flaming or spamming it so please don’t :o oh and don’t get to far off-topic :D. If you view this and like it, post your opinion, even if you don’t, POST IT! Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Project RL
item.dc:creator: @this.sucks this.sucks();
item.description:
@this.sucks wrote:

Yeah, you forgot to add originality.

item.title: Project RL
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

Aww, man, I thought you were someone else Zach, I swear lol. I’m glad I read your Signature You should really consider helping me and Will man. Anything I left out up there?

Read full topic

item.title: Project RL
item.dc:creator: @this.sucks this.sucks();
item.description:
@this.sucks wrote:

StringBuilder sb1 = new StringBuilder(listOfFails);
StringBuilder sb2 = new StringBuilder(listOfEpicFails);
StringBuilder sb3 = new StringBuilder(listOfNonFails);
String listOfFails;
String listOfEpicFails;
String listOfNonFails;
void fail(String type, String object) {
	if (type.equals("Epic")) sb2.append(Object); else if (type.equals("Non-Fial") sb3.append(Object); else sb1.append(Object);
}
fail("Non-Fail", "http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,266448.0.html");

=)

Read full topic
